subject: Career
title: The Exploding Offer Tactic
description: A fast breakdown of The Exploding Offer Tactic for builders.

hook.text: 'This offer expires Friday.' They're creating urgency to stop you from shopping around.

buildup.text: Exploding offers use time pressure to force decisions before you can compare alternatives.

discovery.text: Most 'deadlines' are soft. Politely asking for an extension often works without consequence.

twist.text: If they truly won't extend, that tells you how they treat employees â€” transactional from day one.

climax.text: Say: 'I want to give this the consideration it deserves. Can we extend to next Wednesday?'

punchline.text: Real deadlines are rare. Test them.

quiz.question: What should you do when given an exploding offer?
